channel.title: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360
channel.description:
http://www.pcworld.com/businesscenter/article/193563/microsoft_update_enables_usb_storage_for_xbox_360.html
I've heard some rumors about this allowing you to mod games and edit saves, thought it was interesting even though it was quite a while ago.

item.title: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:3, topic:338479”]Youve been able to mod gamesaves for like ever Oh and microsoft is coming up with xbox branded usbsticks which will cost motherfucking tons.

Tico my friends and I have played my castle crashers on another xbox but I just had to start it with my profile and it worked.[/quote]

Sweet, I can’t wait to try it then. Achievement Hunter (RoosterTeeth on YouTube) did a comparison for which usb storage device is fastest, view it here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ujSDOUSMHts

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360

item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Youve been able to mod gamesaves for like ever Oh and microsoft is coming up with xbox branded usbsticks which will cost motherfucking tons.

Tico my friends and I have played my castle crashers on another xbox but I just had to start it with my profile and it worked.

item.title: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Old, but so far I love it. I did just recently notice that you can copy DLC to another storage device, but I’ve yet to see if you can transfer it to another console and have it operate correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360

item.title: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

PCWorld

Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360

Microsoft enables USB storage for the Xbox 360 gaming console.

I’ve heard some rumors about this allowing you to mod games and edit saves, thought it was interesting even though it was quite a while ago.

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft Update Enables USB Storage for Xbox 360
